sources.title: Vontier Named to Newsweek's Most Responsible Companies 2025 List
sources.snippet: Significant rise in ranking in company's second consecutive year on the list Vontier Corporation (NYSE: VNT), a leading global provider of critical technologies and solutions to connect, manage and scale the mobility ecosystem, has been named to Newsweek's list of America's Most Responsible Companies 2025 . This is the second consecutive year Vontier has been named to the prestigious list.
